steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
Select the entire document by pressing 'Ctrl + A' on your keyboard.
Click on the 'Line and Paragraph Spacing' button in the 'Paragraph' group.
From the drop-down menu, select '2.0' to set the line spacing to double.
Verify that the entire document is now double-spaced.
Save the changes to the document.
